content: carefully drop yarn loop from hook insert hook into next stitch from front to back and pull dropped loop through to front chain-3 double_crochet in same st at base of chain = 2 double_crochet 2 double_crochet in each following st don t miss the last one join with a slip_stitch in gap between chain-3 and first double_crochet do not cut yarn 32 double_crochet r4 white see note for r2 above fpsc around next st single_crochet in next st repeat from beginning all around fasten_off invisibly or join with a slip_stitch in 2nd st and cut yarn 16 single_crochet 16 fpsc if you re planning to stick to the suggested colour progression you now have your moon 4 r5 light work into front loops only as indicated single_crochet flo in any single_crochet *skip next st 6 double_crochet in next st skip next st single_crochet flo in next st** repeat from * to ** all around omitting last single_crochet flo fasten_off invisibly or join with a slip_stitch in 2nd st and cut yarn 8 single_crochet flo 48 double_crochet r6 medium work behind r5 into back loops of r4 as indicated 2 double_crochet blo in any unworked back loop in r4 behind an single_crochet *chain-2 skip next 3 st in r5 first half of 6 double_crochet shell single_crochet in gap between stitches in centre of shell chain-2 skip next 3 sts in r5 2 double_crochet blo in next back loop in r4** repeat from * to ** all around omitting final 2 double_crochet join with a slip_stitch in 2nd st the first double_crochet after standing st or substitute chain do not cut yarn 16 double_crochet blo 8 single_crochet 16 chain-2 r7 medium before you start carefully drop yarn loop from hook insert hook into next chain space from front to back and pull dropped loop through to front work only into chain spaces and ignore all other stitches chain-3 2 double_crochet in same chain space = 3 double_crochet 3 double_crochet in each chain space all around fasten_off invisibly or join with a slip_stitch and cut yarn 48 double_crochet 5 r8 dark work into r7 except where indicated begin in gap between 3 double_crochet groups directly above centre of shell in earlier round *2 double_crochet in gap between 3 double_crochet groups skip next st 2 double_crochet in next st double_crochet in next st working in front of r7 and r6 treble_crochet in single_crochet in r5 immediately below double_crochet in next st 2dc in next st skip next st** repeat from * to ** all around fasten_off invisibly or join with a slip_stitch in 2nd st and cut yarn 64 double_crochet 8 treble_crochet r9 - light fpsc around treble_crochet chain-3 skip next 2 st fpsc around next st chain-3 skip next 2 st fpsc around next st chain-3 skip next 2 st repeat from beginning all around fasten_off invisibly or join with a slip_stitch in 2nd st and cut yarn 24 fpsc 24 chain-3 r10 medium work behind r9 entirely into r8 all the stitches
